channel.title: Downloaded clients errors
channel.description: Every single time i download a client, and run it, it always says theres an error, which can be seen in the attachment... someone please help me!!! :([br][size=1]Posted on: April 28, 2007, 05:01:17 PM[/size][hr]help please...

item.title: Downloaded clients errors
item.dc:creator: @brennen brennen
item.description:
@brennen wrote:

Alright go to the run client and hit edit…now you’ve opened the notpad on the 4th line it should somthing about Java well delete all that and replace it with this

java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar client If you have any probelems with that post it back on here and ill help you.

        Thank you 
                     Kenny

Read full topic
